header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_how-to-filter-on-element-names-linq-to-xml.5ea69886419357a14a964a3b0201b6934a0e58f9.pt-br is different with handoff file name: how-to-filter-on-element-names-linq-to-xml.5ea69886419357a14a964a3b0201b6934a0e58f9.pt-br.

trans-unit.source: How to: Filter on Element Names (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Como: Filtrar em nomes de elemento (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) | Documentos do Microsoft

trans-unit.source: How to: Filter on Element Names (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Como: Filtrar em nomes de elemento (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: When you call one of the methods that return <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, you can filter on the element name.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama um dos métodos que retornam <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>de <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, você pode filtrar no nome do elemento.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: Example
This example retrieves a collection of descendants that is filtered to contain only descendants with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo retorna uma coleção de descendentes que é filtrada para conter somente descendentes com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: This example uses the following XML document: [Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-typical-purchase-order-linq-to-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo usa o seguinte documento XML: [arquivo XML de exemplo: ordem de compra típica (LINQ to XML)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-typical-purchase-order-linq-to-xml.md).

trans-unit.source: <CodeContentPlaceHolder>0</CodeContentPlaceHolder>
This code produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: Esse código gera a seguinte saída:

trans-unit.source: <CodeContentPlaceHolder>1</CodeContentPlaceHolder>
The other methods that return <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> collections follow the same pattern.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos que retornam <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>de <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>coleções seguem o mesmo padrão.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: Their signatures are similar to <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Elements%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A>.
The following is the complete list of methods that have similar method signatures:
trans-unit.target: O seguinte é a lista completa dos métodos semelhantes que tenham assinaturas de método:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.Ancestors%2A>
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A>
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Elements%2A>
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.ElementsAfterSelf%2A>
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.ElementsBeforeSelf%2A>
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.AncestorsAndSelf%2A>
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.DescendantsAndSelf%2A>
Example
The following example shows the same query for XML that is in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a mesma consulta para XML que está em um namespace.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/working-with-xml-namespaces.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [trabalhar com Namespaces XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/working-with-xml-namespaces.md).

trans-unit.source: This example uses the following XML document: [Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order in a Namespace](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-typical-purchase-order-in-a-namespace.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo usa o seguinte documento XML: [arquivo XML de exemplo: ordem de compra típico em um Namespace](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-typical-purchase-order-in-a-namespace.md).

trans-unit.source: This code produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: Esse código gera a seguinte saída:
